I proposed an amendment to the #PFAS Action Act, requiring Admin @EPAAWheeler to certify completion of the PFAS Action Plan before this bill is enacted.

I’m thrilled my amendment passed and will now be voted on by the full House. Watch my testimony HERE➡️  https://youtu.be/EZxaVTViDUI  pic.twitter.com/YndO6SGutr
In response to greater awareness of #PFAS, the @EPA announced the PFAS Action Plan to work with federal, state, tribal, and local partners to understand and act on known PFAS dangers.

PFAS can also be found in life-saving products like:

🔥 Firefighting foam 🧯
💉 Medical devices ⚕️

These substances help protect Americans’ lives by fighting infections and putting out blazes.

You may have never heard of PFAS substances, but they can be found all around your home, in:

🛋️ Furniture and carpets
🍳 Nonstick cookware
☂️ Umbrellas and rain gear
🍕 Pizza boxes
👖 Stain-resistant clothing
🍬 Food wrappers
